Summary: Redish-orange fireball traveling from NW to SE.
divs: sighting detailsi was in saint paul, minnesota getting into my car when i glanced up and saw a redish-orange light\fireball flying in my direction. at first i dismissed it as a ufo because i live with a few miles of an international airport, but as the light\fireball got closer and closer, there was no noise. it flew in a perfectly straight line and after a few minutes, the light\fireball was so far away, i just couldn't see it anymore.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in St Paul
There were no other sightings in St Paul on or around December 17th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
